title: Bounty Inspectors
author: Bounty Inspectors
created_time: July 01, 2023, 02:02:21 PMLast edit: July 30, 2023, 04:27:08 AM by Bounty Inspectors
content: ⛤ WEBSITE ⛤ TELEGRAM Group ⛤  Telegram Channel ⛤  Twitter ⛤_______________________________•  Stars Matic Bounty campaign will run 4 weeks and managed by Bounty Inspectors management service.•  By joining this campaign all participants accept that their works can be used by the team as promotional materials.• All participants must join/follow the  Official social account  of  Stars Company  above to get accepted.• using multiple accounts, cheating and spamming are not allowed. You will be disqualified from the bounty campaign immediately and all your account will be banned permanently.• However, we can't assure the project's success as our duty is to provide a bounty management service for them as freelancers. We areresponsible only for managing the campaign. We are not responsible for the project's success and continuity.• We encourage everyone to do their research and due diligence before investing their time or money. Participating in this bountycampaign or investing in it will be at your own risk.•  Bounty rewards Distribution will be done by project team 4 weeks after campaign ended.[/bDisclaimer: By agreeing to participate in this bounty, you acknowledge that the wallet address you submitted are final and can't be changed.1. All participants must visit Stars Company  Website and must join Stars Company's officialTelegram Group ,Telegram Channeland  Twitter.2. All participants must join Bounty Inspectors Telegram Group, Telegram Channeland Twitter.3. Talking about the bounty program in the project chat group will lead to immediate disqualification from the campaign and an instant ban from the company chat group. Please ask your bounty-related questions in the Bounty Inspectors Group.4. KYC is not required for the bounty campaign. However, the project's team has the right to require KYC for suspicious cases.5. Please note that any offensive or inappropriate behavior will lead to immediate disqualification from the campaign.6. Using multiple accounts, cheating and spamming are not allowed. You will be disqualified from the bounty program immediately and all your accounts will be banned permanently. Brand new accounts are not allowed to join.7. Participants with a minimum of 50+ activity counts on Bitcointalk will be eligible to join the campaigns.8. Participants can not change their wallet address after registration. Please double check your wallet address before registration for any campaign.9. Participants using foul language/funds will be disqualified.10. Negative Trusted Accounts may be allowed into this Campaign if the reason for red trust is libel or unjustifiable. Final Decision is at the Bounty manager's discretion if you have a massively red trusted account or acquiretoo many negatives during the campaign, you accept the risk that you might be eventually removed and your stakes voided.11. All participants must send the Proof of Authentication post to join the bounty program.12. All participants have to submit their weekly reports (for social campaigns) on this bounty thread. Stakes will be calculated on a weekly basis. For each week, you are required to make new reports. Edited reports and POA will not be counted. 13. Rewards will distribute  4 week after campaign ended by project team. Proof of authentication post format:Code:#PROOF OF REGISTRATIONForum Username:Forum Profile Link:Telegram Username:Participated Campaigns:Polygon Wallet Address: Weekly Report Format:Code:Week: Bitcointalk Username:Telegram Username:[b]Twitter Campaign[/b]Twitter Profile Url:Spreadsheet No:Retweets /Tweets Url:1. 2. 3. 4. 5. [b]Telegram Campaign[/b]Telegram Username:Spreadsheet No:Telegram posts Url:1. 2. 3. 4. 5.Twitter               30%Telegram          22%Short video      18%Article               15%Video                 15%Note: Due to the bounty duration and pool, we have limited the number of participants for this bounty.Twitter:  First 300 approved participants.Telegram:  First 250 approved participants.Short:  First 100 approved participants.Article: Top article will selected.Video: Top video will selected.--> Please submit your weekly report on this bounty thread <--Week 1: 1st July - 7th July Week 2: 8th July - 14th JulyWeek 3: 15th July - 21th July Week 4: 22nd July - 28th July --> If you have any problem regarding missing stakes, please fill the form below <--Complaint FormComplaint SpreadsheetNote: Complaints will be checked once in every week.Rewards:  1. Have more than 501 followers: 1 stake/week2. Have more than 1501 followers: 2 stakes/week3. Have more than 5001 followers: 3 stakes/week4. Have more than 10,001 followers: 4 stakes/week5. Have more than 15,001 followers: 5 stakes/weekRules:  1. Every participant must follow Stars Company Twitter Page.2. Twitter accounts must have a minimum of 501 followers.3. Participants have to make new tweets or retweet 5 tweets per week (maximum 1 retweet/day).4. Time gap between 2 retweets/tweets needs to be 10 hours minimum.5. Participants must use @Stars__Company #StarsCompany #Starsmatic #STARS #SRX $SRX #Polygon #Matic #Cryptocurrency #Btc hashtags in every retweet or tweet.How to join:1. Join Stars Company's official Telegram Group, Telegram Channel and Twitter.2. Join Bounty Inspectors Telegram Group, Telegram Channel and Twitter.3. Fill the registration form: https://forms.gle/qXJnBxD1LqT9Zf5i9Rewards:5 stakes/weekRules:1. Update your Telegram name to Your Name | Stars Matic .(Example: BountyInspectors | Stars Matic)2. Replace your profile picture with  Stars Matic.3. Participants can only wear one project name at a time. Wearing more than one project in your telegram name will disqualify you from the campaign.4. Your telegram username must be visible to all while in the community. You must interact with the Telegram account with which you have registered the campaign. Violation of this rule will lead to the removal of all earned stakes.5. Write at least 5 constructive messages in top exchange’s telegram groups (Example: Binance, Kucoin, Gate.io, MEXC , Bitmart etc). Posting messages on other groups won’t be counted.6. Spam or Deleted messages will not be counted. Hashtags "#" are not allowed in the conversation.7. Report your telegram message links weekly. Please obey the report dates and format.8. You must stay in the telegram group until the end of the campaign to receive your stakes.9. You must wear Pirichain's avatar and text until the end of the campaign to receive your stakes.How to join:1. Join Stars Company's official Telegram Group, Telegram Channel and Twitter.2. Join Bounty Inspectors Telegram Group, Telegram Channel and Twitter.3. Fill the registration form: https://forms.gle/ve2L2CyRZwG9M1Uo8Rewards: 1. Have more than 200 views: 1 stake/week2. Have more than 500 views: 2 stakes/week3. Have more than 2000 views: 3 stakes/week4. Have more than 5000 views: 4 stakes/week5. Have more than 10,000 views: 5 stakes/weekRules:  1. TikTok/Youtube Shorts/ Reels etc. accounts should be at least 3 months old.2. TikTok/Youtube Shorts/ Reels etc. accounts must have a minimum of 50 followers.2. Videos need to be unique and have at least 200 views to qualify.3. Videos need to be a minimum of 20 secs in length.4. Participant's short video contents must focus on a relevant topic about the project's features,latest project's token updates/development, etc.5. Participants have to shoot 3 unique videos per week (maximum 1 video/day).6. Participants must use #StarsCompany #Starmatic #STARS #SRX $SRX #Polygon #Cryptocurrency hashtags in every video.How to join:1. Join Stars Company's official Telegram Group, Telegram Channel and Twitter.2. Join Bounty Inspectors Telegram Group, Telegram Channel and Twitter.3. Fill the registration form: https://forms.gle/ntzsR3DujN8mKz6s7Rewards: Very high quality: 4 stakes High quality: 3 stakesGood quality: 2 stakesAverage quality: 1 stakeRules:  1. Each participant can submit 2 article only.2. Articles should be quality and unique with a minimum of 500 words.(Participants who copy the project's website, whitepaper or ANN thread, will not receive rewards).High engagements would be taken note of.3. High engagements but poor quality articles will not be rewarded. Stakes will be awarded based on quality and the number of engagements with other criteria.4. Quality articles with less or no engagements will be rewarded accordingly.5. Participants' forum accounts should be at least 3 months old prior to participating in the article campaign.6. Articles should be published on blogs recommended by us: Steemit, Medium and LinkedIn and must be publicly accessible.7. Content must focus on a relevant topic: Project features, Staking / Liquidity rewards, Presale,Latest project's token updates, Blockchain, etc.8. Only quality and original content will be accepted. Removal/deletion will result in disqualification.9. Published Articles must include at least 2 images of the project, link to the Proof of Authentication, the project's website, Twitter page, Telegram group, Telegram channel or any other social media.10. Please provide enough details of the writer at the end of the article to ensure authenticity. This will be verified!11. By joining this program, participants accept that the project's team can use all these articles as marketing materials.How to join:1. Join Stars Company's official Telegram Group, Telegram Channel and Twitter.2. Join Bounty Inspectors Telegram Group, Telegram Channel and Twitter.3. Fill the registration form: https://forms.gle/xkNh2VV1digRgcfA8Rewards:  1. Normal quality :1 stake 2. Good quality: 2 stakes 3. High quality: 3 stakes Rules:  1. Each participant can send 1 video only.2. Participants must have at least 200+ youtube subscribers,Videos need to be a minimum of 3 minutes in length.3. Participants with a minimum of 30+ activity counts on Bitcointalk will be eligible to join video campaigns .4. Video contents must focus on a relevant topic: project features, latest project's token updates, blockchain, etc.5. Each video must have 200 views to be eligible.6. Only original video content will be accepted. Copy from the project website, YouTube channels or from others' work will be rejected.7. Face cam video will be highly recommended and considered. 8. High engagements but poor quality video will not be rewarded. Stakes will be awarded based on the number of engagements and quality.9. Videos should never be removed. Removal/deletion will result in disqualification.10. All videos need to have a link to the Proof of Authentication, project's website,Medium page, Twitter page, Telegram group, YouTube channel or any other social media.11. Please provide enough details of the producer (bounty hunter) at the end of the video to ensure authenticity. This will be verified!How to join:1. Join Stars Company's official Telegram Group, Telegram Channel and Twitter.2. Join Bounty Inspectors Telegram Group, Telegram Channel and Twitter.3. Fill the registration form: https://forms.gle/183mZ9tMrVSvcRyj8
